redeemer. See commentary on 41:14.

formed thee from the womb. See commentary on 44:2; see also 1 Ne. 21:5.

I am the Lord that maketh all things. By reminding us that he made all things and that by himself he "stretcheth forth the heavens" and "spreadeth abroad the earth," the Lord gives us confidence in his ability to raise up Cyrus to deliver the Jews from Babylonian captivity and to raise up Jesus Christ to deliver all of us from death and sin.
